name: PU RPG
description:
This is a fangame based off PU, which is a Roblox fangame of a certain monster fighting game.

Its not that great of a game, but eh. I'm finishing it because I want to.

You can do stuff such as:

- Befriend an Eevee

- Meet Eggs

- Maybe a dog or 2?

- An RPG where absolutely everyone you fight has to die! oh wait thats just a normal rpg
